column8: text

http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/378625Rafizi: Hadi mentioned '1MDB' only once in Parliament since mid-201310 April 20171MDB has been a hot topic for opposition lawmakers during Dewan Rakyat sittings since 2013, except for PAS president Abdul Hadi Awang, according to PKR vice-president Rafizi Ramli.Rafizi said he went through the Dewan Rakyat records and established that the number of times Hadi mentioned "1MDB" amounted to a grand total of just one."Since June 2013 until now, (records) show that he appears to be avoiding the 1MDB issue."The Marang MP only mentioned '1MDB' once, although (the issue) has been the source of Malaysia's problems since 2011," he added in a statement today...For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year (full news access)or RM420 a year (full news + full archive access). If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.

column7: From: Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster
column8: Dis why Kelantan so backward.Economic matters not important. Asal ada hudud, all is well.Like religion can put food on your table...but its OK...if you starve to death or die from dysentry, can go enjoy heaven early.

Focus, focus.  Maybe you don't want medal, but want cash......
I don't want medal or cash too.
